Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should the Council act quickly and make 
all these unimportant Jume related 
polls illegal? 

  o Yes 
  o No 
  o First I'd have to know what Jume is. 
  o Who cares? 
  o Who cares?  I care, because it's the final countdown! 
  o All who do not fall to the will of Jume will be devoured by the great amish god, Jeremiah! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
